channel.title: Dev on Najam Sikander Awan

item.title: Vim Usage
item.description: ctrl+0 and ctrl+shit+i is the combo for going back and forth using vim jumps. Normally it should be ctrl+i or tab to jump forward. If it’s not working then I found you can use ctrl+shift+i. Will keep updating this post with other vim related things that i want to track and share. Golang Sometimes if you install golang package using go get in terminal outside vim editor. It’s still showing import error.
